snippet: Chris Sale threw six scoreless innings for his 17th win, helping the Chicago White Sox keep their one-game lead in the American League Central by beating the Twins, 6-0, on Friday.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Chicago White Sox beat the Minnesota Twins, 6-0; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Sale threw six scoreless innings for his 17th win, helping the Chicago White Sox keep their one-game lead in the American League Central by beating the Twins, 6-0, on Friday.

headline.seo: White Sox Shut Out Twins and Retain Hold on First Place
headline.main: Shutting Out Minnesota, White Sox Hold Steady
headline.print_headline: Shutting Out Minnesota, White Sox Hold Steady
